title: The Faerie Wand
description: I thought I could return home once the Faerie Games were over. I was wrong.  Now, Julian and I must complete the dangerous quest given to us by the Empress of the Otherworld. The Holy Wand is out there. We just need to find it.  No matter where the journey takes us, we'll destroy anything blocking our path. We have to. Otherwise, we'll be dead.  Romance. Magic. Adventure. The twist-filled, action-packed Faerie Games series continues with The Faerie Wand, the fourth book in an addicting fantasy series by USA Today bestselling author Michelle Madow!
author: Michelle Madow
